summary: Build a modern, professional, responsive marketing website for the digital service center “Nath Cyber Cafe” with a clean minimalist royal blue/cyan/white theme, multi-page structure (Home/About/Services/Contact), service listings, contact/WhatsApp, map placeholder, social media integration, SEO and performance focus.
architectural_notes: Multi-page marketing site: Home, About, Services, Contact with consistent header/footer and responsive layout.
Include SEO basics (semantic HTML, meta tags, proper headings) and performance-minded assets.
Include WhatsApp deep link/chat button and social media links.
Google Maps integration to use a placeholder location until final address is provided.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional flat/vector illustration of a computer and digital services desk scene in royal blue/cyan/white (hero-illustration.dim_1200x800.png)
- Simple minimalist logo mark for “Nath Cyber Cafe” in royal blue/cyan/white on transparent background (logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Favicon icon derived from the logo mark, flat and high-contrast (favicon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create a modern, professional, responsive multi-page website for the digital service center named “Nath Cyber Cafe” using a clean minimalist layout, royal blue/cyan/white color palette, and modern sans-serif typography.
Implement routing and pages: Home, About Us, Services, and Contact, with a consistent header/navigation and footer across all pages.

Build the Home page hero section with the exact headline “Complete Digital & Online Services Under One Roof”, subheading “Fast, Trusted & Affordable Services”, two CTA buttons (“Contact Now” and “View Services”), and a professional illustration area aligned with a computer/digital services theme.

Create a Services section (and a detailed Services page) that presents categorized service blocks with the following categories and items: Government & Online Services (New Government Schemes Apply, Job Vacancy Form Filling, Scholarship Apply, Caste Certificate, Income Certificate, Voter ID Card, PAN Card, E-Shram Card, All Online Form Filling Services); Graphic Design Services (Logo Design, Resume / CV Design, Visiting Card Design, Banner & Poster Design, Invitation Card Design, Social Media Post Design, Passport Size Photo Editing); School & College Support (School Project Files, College Assignments, Practical Files, PPT Presentation, Cover Page Design, Typing & Formatting Work).
Add a “Why Choose Us” section with the following points: Fast & Trusted Service; Affordable Charges; Proper Guidance; Customer Satisfaction Priority.

Implement contact features: display business name “Nath Cyber Cafe”, phone numbers “9435212145 / 91260 26463”, add a WhatsApp chat button, include a contact form with fields (Name, Phone, Message), and show a Google Map embed area using a location placeholder.
Add social media integration by rendering a set of social icons/links in the footer (and/or contact area) with configurable URLs (placeholders by default) for common platforms.

Implement SEO-friendly structure across pages: semantic headings, per-page document titles and meta descriptions, Open Graph/Twitter preview tags, and basic LocalBusiness structured data (JSON-LD) for “Nath Cyber Cafe” using the provided phone numbers.

Ensure fast loading and a secure, professional layout by optimizing assets (compressed images), avoiding unnecessary heavy libraries, and providing a polished UI with accessible color contrast and focus states.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create responsive website UI with clean minimalist royal blue/cyan/white theme and modern sans-serif typography
Build Home page with hero (headline, subheading, CTA buttons) and professional digital-service illustration area
Add Services section with categorized service blocks (Government & Online, Graphic Design, School & College Support) and listed items
Add 'Why Choose Us' section with key trust/benefit points
Add Contact section with business name, phone numbers, WhatsApp button, contact form, and Google Map placeholder integration
Create additional pages: About Us (short professional description), Services (detailed listing), Contact page
Implement technical requirements: SEO-optimized structure, fast loading performance, social media integration, WhatsApp chat button, secure/professional layout
